bookText.htmlContent: Slerm are a very big, slimy and almost blind snail-like creature which often nests in a hive with a queen at it's head.

There whole body is covered in a sticky snail skin which makes it difficult to escape for their victoms once catched.

Their bodies constently soak up wet air that surrounds them, to turn it into more thick slime that oozes form their skin, guaranteeing a good habitat for their queen.

Their once human mammary glands have been transformed into slime-factories, which are able to squirt slime over 2 meters adding another means of trapping their victims.
